director.name: 娜塔莎·帕兹米 Natasza Parzymies

introduction: Zofia and Ania are two senior ladies, each quite a character. They have already put the years of madness behind them – or maybe not? They have not seen each other for half a century. Each followed her own path. One of them finds herself in a situation that creates a new scenario for both. She would like to tear it apart and discard it, but maybe she should grapple with it and go on a journey, one of a kind? There is only one life and possibly one love.源自：https://www.krakowfilmfestival.pl/en/online-cinema/film/4093/
